name: LMMS Project File
summary: Learn about .MMPZ files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: To create the MMPZ file, click the save icon in the top-left of the application or select Project → Save or Save As..., name your project, choose the save location, and click Save.
To open the MMPZ file, you can simply double-click the file. You can also open the project inside of the application, select Project → Open..., navigate to your file, select it, and click Open.
NOTE: LMMS replaced the .MMP file extension with the MMPZ extension.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
